nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Pilot

Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Pilot is a children's book released on March 28, 2000 by Random House. Written by Marc Cerasini and designed by Iain R. Morris, the book is told from young Anakin Skywalker's point of view as he describes spacecraft and vehicles.

My name is Anakin Skywalker. I am a pilot. I have flown Podracers across the Tatooine desert and ridden a starfighter in space. There are other pilots in my galaxy, and they all fly different ships. Open this book and I will show you!
